item.title: Hyperloop wants to connect these major European cities with high-speed trains.
item.description:
Hyperloop wants to connect these major European cities with high-speed trains.

Vienna to Bratislava in eight minutes flat: that's exactly what Hyperloop Transportation Technologies (HTT) is hoping to do with their new proposed high-speed train. The company recently signed a deal with the government of Slovakia to investigate the possibility of building a Hyperloop that would link three European capitals.

item.title: Timbuk2 + Blue Bottle's Sabbatical Travel Kit
item.description:
Timbuk2 + Blue Bottle's Sabbatical Travel Kit

If the recent buyouts of Intelligentsia and Stumptown are any indication, the growing popularity of craft coffee shows no signs of slowing down. While single origin pour-overs are now commonplace in many coffeeshops, sometimes when you're off the beaten path, your morning cup of coffee is harder to perfect.

item.title: OneCook Personal Robotic Chef
item.description:
OneCook Personal Robotic Chef

Modern kitchen appliances can brew you the perfect espresso, bake a fluffy loaf of bread, mix a killer cocktail or even blend up a personalized smoothie-all with the press of a single button. So why not program them to cook a full meal? That's exactly what Boston-based company TNL Corp.
